SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, BRAND, CAFFEINE, IMAGE_URL FROM MENU WHERE BRAND = #{brand} ORDER BY
CAST(SUBSTRING(CAFFEINE, 1, LOCATE('mg', CAFFEINE) - 1) AS UNSIGNED) DESC
CAST(SUBSTRING(CAFFEINE, 1, LOCATE('mg', CAFFEINE) - 1) AS UNSIGNED) ASC
MENU_NAME ASC
MENU_NAME ASC
LIMIT #{pageable.pageSize} OFFSET #{pageable.offset}

SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, CAFFEINE, PRICE, IMAGE_URL FROM MENU
and BRAND = #{brand}
and CAFFEINE = "0mg"
ORDER BY
CAST(SUBSTRING(CAFFEINE, 1, LOCATE('mg', CAFFEINE) - 1) AS UNSIGNED) DESC
CAST(SUBSTRING(CAFFEINE, 1, LOCATE('mg', CAFFEINE) - 1) AS UNSIGNED) ASC
MENU_NAME ASC
LIMIT #{pageable.pageSize} OFFSET #{pageable.offset}

SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, CAFFEINE, BRAND, PRICE, IMAGE_URL FROM MENU
and CAFFEINE = "0mg"
and MENU_NAME like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
ORDER BY
CAST(SUBSTRING(CAFFEINE, 1, LOCATE('mg', CAFFEINE) - 1) AS UNSIGNED) DESC,
CAST(SUBSTRING(CAFFEINE, 1, LOCATE('mg', CAFFEINE) - 1) AS UNSIGNED) ASC,
CASE BRAND WHEN '스타벅스' THEN 1 WHEN '투썸' THEN 2 WHEN '컴포즈' THEN 3 WHEN '이디야' THEN 4 WHEN '빽다방' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END, MENU_NAME ASC LIMIT #{pageable.pageSize} OFFSET #{pageable.offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MENU
and CAFFEINE = "0mg"
and MENU_NAME like concat('%', #{word}, '%')

SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, IMAGE_URL FROM MENU
and CAST(SUBSTRING(CAFFEINE, 1, LOCATE('mg', CAFFEINE) - 1) AS UNSIGNED) < #{base}
and CAFFEINE = '0mg'
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
